pages.text: You can encounter the $(#5454fc)Cave Dweller$() in the depths of the overworld. He is hostile due to madness, but easily outrun.$(br2)If you $(#00a800)flee$(), he will eventually leave you be. I recommend this course of action, unless you intend to $(6)study him$().

$(br2)He is $(#00a800)afraid of the $(#00a8a8)Camera Obscura$(), as it can $(#00a800)harm him when used$(). Hide behind it to stay safe while you observe him.$(br2)Once you have $(#00a800)thoroughly assessed$() him, perhaps you can find out why he is here.
Whoever he was, he is lost to madness.
pages.name: Cave Dweller
